channel.title: 1000xRESIST on My not-quite-daily notes
channel.description: Recent content in 1000xRESIST on My not-quite-daily notes

item.title: 1000xRESIST
item.description: Sometimes you play a game, and maybe that game is fun for a while, but when you’re done, nothing really sticks with you. You bring nothing to the table, you take nothing away, and you’re finished with it, done and dusted. I find this to be a pretty common experience with AAA games these days, to be honest.
